Demon Wulf/Flesh Ripper/Dark Claw:



The three Vok beings followed Reptilica.

"Faster." Demon said loudly.

Flesh Ripper transformed to his hyena mode, only it looked like a hyena that had been fed a dish full of steroids.  With drool dripping from his mouth, the animal padded over to Reptilica's right, bearing his teeth.
"Faster."
